Package gameCore

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NPC
    A NPC is a interface for all non-player characters Must implement move(String direction)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    A Character is a superclass for all of the animated creatures inside the game.
    Edge
    An edge exists between 2 tiles, or a tile and the boundary of a level.
    Exit
    An exit is an Edge with a "lock." When locked, it is crossable only by a character with the specified key.
    Inventory
    Inventory is a collection of Items.
    Item
    A Item is a basic unit that can be carried in the Inventory.
    LayoutObject
    A class to be inherited from for objects that are intrinsic to the Layout of the Map Essentially an interface, but made abstract due to the fact that it should extend Observable
    Monster
    A Monster is a subclass of NPC.
    Player
    A Character is a superclass for all of the animated creatures inside the game.
    Room
    A room is a collection of tiles.
    Tile
    A Tile is the minimal unit in the game.
    Weapon
    A Weapon is a type of item that has an attack to increase the character's attack value.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
